text: Watee Ibrahim Neuci le Tuhan Neubri cubaan deungon peurintah Teuma geupubuet laju le gopnyan Neukheun phireuman teuma le Allah Lon peujeut gata jinoe keu imum Manusia dum gata peurintah Ibrahim geukheun aneuk cucolon Tuhan kheun bak Lon bek nyan tapeugah Keu soe nyang lalem hana janji Lon Han jeut tatulong meunyo nyang salah
